name: Margaret Tulip 9" Dishcloth Afghan Block Square
description: Beautifully detailed lace tulip design surrounded by seed stitch borders is sure to please. It’s a little more challenging than it looks. Chart provided, written instructions with chart. Pretty!
full_text: Beautifully detailed lace tulip design surrounded by seed stitch borders is sure to please. It’s a little more challenging than it looks. Chart provided, written instructions with chart. Pretty! Rated--Advanced Beginner to Intermediate simple increases and decreases (k2tog, yo, sk2p, ssk), following chart Adapted for afghan square from Barbara Walker Stitch dictionary pattern. Copyright note: Because patterns are FREE, does not give you the right to copy them in their entirety for any use whatsoever without permission. Simply LINK to the pattern from your blog or website, etc. If you wish to use this block for CAL’s, please ask me first.
